General.Name: ESGEN Acquisition Corp Unit
General.Description: ESGEN Acquisition Corporation does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company intends to target opportunities in the energy and infrastructure sector in North America. ESGEN Acquisition Corporation was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Dallas, Texas.
General.Address: 5956 Sherry Lane, Dallas, TX, United States, 75225
